materials.description: A gold foil leaf ticket, used as decoration for the guild's festivals. Bring it to the Smithy and...!?

materials.name: Large Elder Dragon Bone
materials.description: Material from master rank elder dragons. Equal parts austere and wild, it seems untouched by time.

materials.name: Pure Dragon Blood
materials.description: Elder dragon blood that contains a more potent mix of its mysterious ingredient.

materials.name: Namielle Hardclaw
materials.description: Very rare Namielle material. Obtained by breaking its forelegs. Sharp, used in many weapons.

materials.name: Hero King Coin
materials.description: A gleaming golden coin awarded to those who complete especially tough master rank Arena quests.

materials.name: Gold Rajang Pelt+
materials.description: Very rare Rajang material. Hard to obtain, but greatly increases the effectiveness of equipment.

materials.name: Rajang Apoplexy
materials.description: Very rare Furious Rajang material. A long, fine mane that is extremely robust.

materials.name: Ghoulish Gold Gorer
materials.description: Very rare Furious Rajang material. A golden horn that, even when broken, is filled with the rage of a Rajang.

materials.name: Rajang Heart
materials.description: Very rare furious Rajang material. Its flesh-searing rage unleashes massive power with every beat.

materials.name: Indestructible Ebonshell
materials.description: Very rare Raging Brachydios material. The sturdiest material known, capable of withstanding any blast.

materials.name: Brach Warhead
materials.description: Very rare raging brachydios material. A skull that rage has turned into something far worse.

materials.name: Brach Obliterator
materials.description: Very rare Raging Brachydios material. A violent core capable of instantly obliterating targets.

materials.name: Immortal Reactor
materials.description: Very rare Raging Brachydios material. A rare organ used to render slime more volatile when in peril.

materials.name: Large Wyvern Gem
materials.description: A wyvern gem that has grown further over the ages. Emits a mesmerizing shimmer.

materials.name: Bergcrusher Claw
materials.description: Very rare Frostfang Barioth material. Obtained as a reward and by carving. Sharp, used in many weapons.

materials.name: Silverwhite Frostfang
materials.description: Very rare Frostfang Barioth material. Obtained by breaking its head. Sharp, used in many weapons.

materials.name: Frostfang Ticket
materials.description: Proof that you've hunted a tempered Frostfang Barioth. Bring it to the Smithy for a nice surprise!
